content.subtitle: MULTI-CLIENT MANAGEMENT
content.title: A Centralized Hub for All Your Clients
content.text: Manage all your client accounts from a single, intuitive dashboard. Securely switch between client workspaces, manage campaigns, and monitor performance without logging in and out of multiple accounts. Maintain brand consistency and streamline your workflow.
features: Unified dashboard for all client accounts
